name: Virgin Brazilian body wave
description: Virgin Brazilian Hair is the finest quality premium Brazilian human hair available. Each selection has been collected from one donor all cuticles are intact and you will notice each selection of Virgin hair has a natural taper at the end. All Virgin Brazilian Hair has undergone a stringent quality assurance process to ensure it is free of imperfections. Each bundle of Virgin Brazilian Hair is 4 ounces and available in a natural 1b-2. With proper care you can expect this product to last well up to a year. Also available in 18in and 20inEach bundle weights about 4 Oz. 3 Bundles are typically enough for a full-sew in

name: Virgin Malaysian deep wave
description:
This luxury Virgin Malaysian Remy hair in its natural state is  thick, soft and beautiful. Due to the virgin state of Malaysian Remy hair, it is incredibly versatile. The hair can be dyed, curled with a curling iron or straightened with a flat iron to achieve the style of your choice. Malaysian Remy Hair is naturally straight but has a subtle wave when washed and air dried. Machine Wefted. 
Product at a Glance
Premium 100% Virgin Malaysian Remy
Beautiful, soft straight texture
Durable Machine Weft (Sealing is recommended to ensure longer lifespan)
Each bundle is approx. 3.7 to 4 ounces of hair*
Natural Colors Ranging from 1, 1B, 2 **
 
 
*It generally takes 6-8 ounces for a full install, if installing longer than 16 inches you  may need additional bundles to achieve desired fullness.
 
**Malaysian Virgin hair is natural in color ranging from medium brown to black.

name: Virgin Peruvian straight
description:
Peruvian Hair is one of the most exotic hair type in the market. Peruvian hair has many purpose, it is lightweight but still carries lots of volume. Peruvian Hair has soft and silky texture, availalbe in natural black and natural brown shades. As usual, we only offer 100% Virgin Hair, therefore our peruvian hair is obtained from a single donor and has not been chemically altered or processed. It is Shed-Free and Tangle-Free, so you can rest assured that you are purchasing top notch hair. We guarantee that you will love our long lasting and beautiful hair.
Each bundle weights about 4 Oz. 3 Bundles are typically enough for a full-sew in

name: Rusk Deepshine Oil Protective Treament
description:
Deepshine Oil is perfect for all hair types. Deepshine Oil smooths the cuticle, eliminates frizz, and imparts incredible shine and condition. Deepshine Oil is a marine mineral-enriched argan oil treatment that smooths the cuticle, eliminates frizz, and improves elasticity and hydration, leaving hair soft, silky and manageable. This lightweight, alcohol-free formula imparts brilliant shine, while advanced marine therapy infuses the hair with superior condition, renewing the natural integrity of the hair. Used as a styling or finishing product, Deepshine Oil helps seal the cuticle, prevent color fading with subsequent shampoos, and protect against damage caused by chemicals, excessive heat from thermal styling, and environmental factors. Use: For styling, thermal protection and frizz control, apply a small amount to damp hair and style. For finishing, apply a few drops to dry hair as needed. 
For use during color service with Deepshine Pure Pigments Conditioning Cream Color or Deepshine Demi Ammonia-Free Tone-on-Tone Cream Color: Add a maximum of 3 drops of Deepshine Oil to haircolor mixture and process as usual. This will enhance shine and condition and help seal the cuticle, reducing color washout during post-service shampoo.
